title: Adobe | CS1 | NOIDA
content:
Education: B Tech in CSE
Previous company - Amazon. Laid off from Amazon.
Previous Compensation - 90LPA(50/35/5)
Years of Experience: 8
Date of the Offer: Dec 2023
Company: Adobe
Title/Level: CS1
Location: Noida
Base Salary: 38 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 6/0
Stock Bonus: $ 100K/4
Retention Bonus - 3 

I know it's Low ball but giving myself some time to chill and enjoy with less work stress.

title: Google |L4|Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech NIT
Years of Experience: 3 year
Prior Experience: Microsoft
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE3 (L4)
Location: Bangalore
Offer: Oct 2023
Salary: INR 38,00,000
Performance bonus: INR 5,70,000 (15% of base)
Signing Bonus: INR 5,00,000
Relocation bonus: INR 5,00,000
PF: INR 1,84,000 (Company contribution)
Stock bonus: 95000 USD over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Stocks + Bonus): 
~INR 85,50,300 (1st year)
~INR 70,77,200 (2nd year)
~INR 61,31,000 (3rd year)
~INR 53,42,500 (4th year)
Benefits: Standard Google benefits
Details: Entire process took around 3 months and YOE at time of joining is 3.5 years. No competing offer.
